# sqlitePragmas

**Instance Property**

The SQLite pragmas set for the associated persistent store. (read-only)

## Declaration

```swift
var sqlitePragmas: [String : NSObject] { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains all of the pragmas set on the associated persistent store. This property is only relevant when the [doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/NSPersistentStoreDescription/type] is set to [doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/NSSQLiteStoreType].

## Accessing the Configuration Options

- **options**: A dictionary representation of the options set on the associated persistent store.
